name: talkSchuri
commands: Which topic do you want to ask about?

I can't believe the Lithrasir was a remnant of the demon king's power.|It wasn't spoke of much in the history books compared to the other weapons.|...I guess it's starting to make sense why.|I wonder why so much of it's history was obscured from us...
I never really got a chance to learn much about the founding war when I was young.|What did they say about the Lithrasir in the textbooks?

The Lithrasir was a legendary dark tome unique to Orkney during the founding war.|After slaying the demon king, Orkney passed away soon after.|Every user who tried to wield the Lithrasir went mad soon after,|resulting in the book being sealed by the Greshia royal family.
Looks like this tome was always the dark sheep of the founders' weapons.|Did they ever describe what Orkney was like?

Not much was known about Orkney besides his contributions to Greshia and the Lithrasir.|Orkney using light magic to wield the Lithrasir was news to me,|and they never mentioned his soul being casted into the tome...|or later fading away...
That tome isn't making you feel any different right...?
When I hold it, it feels strangely heavy.|It feels like I have to constantly use light magic to lighten the book.
Let's end this battle quick so we can give this book back to Sir Aesc.
I'm glad you chose not to take that book with us.
I was defintely thinking about it to be honest...|But you and Senya are right.|It's not worth the risk.
At least Sir Aesc loaned us his Ivaldi.|...Didn't he mention he would give you it because you didn't take Lithrasir?
...He did.|Do you think he was gonna keep Ivaldi in case something happened with the Lithrasir?
I'm...not sure.|He's mysterious for sure but I think he would have loaned us Ivaldi anyway.
Lilith...We learned a little bit about her,|Yet all we've got is more questions.|Why is she trying to resurrect the demon king?|Could she have been corrupted by the Lathrasir?
When we learned about the Lathrasir...|I thought that was the source of her power.|The fact that she didn't take it with her...|What on earth could be the source of her power?
...I'm reminded of her threat to Sir Cyrus.|She threatened to reanimate Sir Cyrus...|Do you think he managed to get away?
...I hope so.|If we had to face teach...I don't know what I would do.
With these weapons Sir Aesc gave us...|{var:MC_Name}!
Let's vow to stop this Lilith person and rescue Sir Cyrus!| We'll do this for sure!
Alright! We'll stop Lilith and rescue teach!
Sir Aesc...|There are so many small details piling up on him.
No, it's strange but...I trust him.|Maybe I should be more like Senya and be wary but,|he feels like he's on our side.
How in the world can he know this much about the founding war?|...Not to mention that he taught teach yet...|Teach never mentioned him at all to me.
Nor to me.|...We've been calling him Sir Aesc since we met him...|But he said that Aesc was a nickname given to him by Sir Cyrus...
Shoot you're right Schuri!|Aesc isn't even the old man's real name...
With the fact that he had in his possession of all the founders weapons...|And he wields the Ivaldi...|Could he be a descendent of one of the original founders?
With how old he looks, he might just be a founder...
Don't be ridiculous {var:MC_Name}, the founding war was centuries ago.|No one could be alive from then.
source:
add_portrait;Schuri;Right
speak;Schuri;Yes?
choice;SchuriConversation4;Which topic do you want to ask about?;Aesc,Lithrasir,Lilith;FLAG(backable);horizontal;top_left
if;game.game_vars['SchuriConversation4'] == 'Lithrasir'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;Schuri;I can't believe the Lithrasir was a remnant of the demon king's power.|It wasn't spoke of much in the history books compared to the other weapons.|...I guess it's starting to make sense why.|I wonder why so much of it's history was obscured from us...
    speak;MC;I never really got a chance to learn much about the founding war when I was young.|What did they say about the Lithrasir in the textbooks?
    speak;Schuri;The Lithrasir was a legendary dark tome unique to Orkney during the founding war.|After slaying the demon king, Orkney passed away soon after.|Every user who tried to wield the Lithrasir went mad soon after,|resulting in the book being sealed by the Greshia royal family.
    speak;MC;Looks like this tome was always the dark sheep of the founders' weapons.|Did they ever describe what Orkney was like?
    speak;Schuri;Not much was known about Orkney besides his contributions to Greshia and the Lithrasir.|Orkney using light magic to wield the Lithrasir was news to me,|and they never mentioned his soul being casted into the tome...|or later fading away...
    if;game.game_vars['_ch3TomeChoice'] == Yes
        speak;Schuri;That tome isn't making you feel any different right...?
        speak;MC;When I hold it, it feels strangely heavy.|It feels like I have to constantly use light magic to lighten the book.
        speak;Schuri;Let's end this battle quick so we can give this book back to Sir Aesc.
        ############################
    elif;game.game_vars['_ch3TomeChoice'] == No
        speak;Schuri;I'm glad you chose not to take that book with us.
        speak;MC;I was defintely thinking about it to be honest...|But you and Senya are right.|It's not worth the risk.
        speak;Schuri;At least Sir Aesc loaned us his Ivaldi.|...Didn't he mention he would give you it because you didn't take Lithrasir?
        speak;MC;...He did.|Do you think he was gonna keep Ivaldi in case something happened with the Lithrasir?
        speak;Schuri;I'm...not sure.|He's mysterious for sure but I think he would have loaned us Ivaldi anyway.
    end
    #####################################
elif;game.game_vars['SchuriConversation4'] == 'Lilith'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;Schuri;Lilith...We learned a little bit about her,|Yet all we've got is more questions.|Why is she trying to resurrect the demon king?|Could she have been corrupted by the Lathrasir?
    speak;MC;When we learned about the Lathrasir...|I thought that was the source of her power.|The fact that she didn't take it with her...|What on earth could be the source of her power?
    speak;Schuri;...I'm reminded of her threat to Sir Cyrus.|She threatened to reanimate Sir Cyrus...|Do you think he managed to get away?
    speak;MC;...I hope so.|If we had to face teach...I don't know what I would do.
    speak;Schuri;With these weapons Sir Aesc gave us...|{var:MC_Name}!
    bop_portrait;Schuri
    bop_portrait;MC
    speak;MC;W-w-what's with the shouting voice?
    speak;Schuri;Let's vow to stop this Lilith person and rescue Sir Cyrus!| We'll do this for sure!
    bop_portrait;MC
    speak;MC;Alright! We'll stop Lilith and rescue teach!
    ##################
elif;game.game_vars['SchuriConversation4'] == 'Aesc'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;Schuri;Sir Aesc...|There are so many small details piling up on him.
    speak;MC;Are you suspicious of him?
    speak;Schuri;No, it's strange but...I trust him.|Maybe I should be more like Senya and be wary but,|he feels like he's on our side.
    speak;MC;How in the world can he know this much about the founding war?|...Not to mention that he taught teach yet...|Teach never mentioned him at all to me.
    speak;Schuri;Nor to me.|...We've been calling him Sir Aesc since we met him...|But he said that Aesc was a nickname given to him by Sir Cyrus...
    speak;MC;Shoot you're right Schuri!|Aesc isn't even the old man's real name...
    speak;Schuri;With the fact that he had in his possession of all the founders weapons...|And he wields the Ivaldi...|Could he be a descendent of one of the original founders?
    speak;MC;With how old he looks, he might just be a founder...
    speak;Schuri;Don't be ridiculous {var:MC_Name}, the founding war was centuries ago.|No one could be alive from then.
    ##################
end
